FuncDef: The display vrrp state-change interface vrid command enables the system to trace changes in the status of a specified VRRP group. The display vrrp state-change interface vrid command enables the system to trace changes in the status of a specified VRRP group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface configured with a VRRP group.
-

Specifies the type an interface configured with a VRRP group.
-

Specifies the number of the interface configured with a VRRP group.
-

Specifies the ID of a VRRP group.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.
